item.title: Sentiment Analysis using Python Vader
item.description: Analyzing the emotions of the customers will help product and service companies to improve their quality. Sentiment Analysis helps in identifying these emotions computationally without any manual intervention. In this article we are not discussing the underlying process of identifying the sentiment, but we use a pre-built engine to process our text. VADER is a rule-based sentiment analysis tool written in Python to analyze a given text. VADER not only tells about the positivity and negativity score but also tells us about how positive or negative it is.

item.title: Reading CSV File in Python
item.description: Today data is available in various formats, like, CSV, JSON, TXT etc. Python provides all the necessary tools to parse these files. In this article we will learn how to parse a large CSV file using Python. We will use Python csv package and pandas to parse the CSV file. I have taken a CSV file of baby names from here. This file contains 250K records of baby names. I am using this data to generate user database to test the login API I have built.
